skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Has a 25% chance of placing a [Block Active Skills] debuff for 1 turn.

skills.desc: Removes all debuffs from this Champion, then fully heals this Champion. Places a 30% [Reflect Damage] buff on this Champion for 2 turns.
skills.name: Undying Fury

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 75% chance of placing a [Block Active Skills] debuff for 2 turns. Damage inflicted is proportional to this Champion's MAX HP.
skills.name: Overpower
